kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: one_cell_in_act_set_for_rt (M1007C0)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been one. This counter covers active sets which are related to RT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: two_cells_in_act_set_for_rt (M1007C1)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been two. This counter covers active sets which are related to RT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: three_cells_in_act_set_rt (M1007C2)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been three. This counter covers active sets which are related to RT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: four_cells_in_act_set_for_rt (M1007C3)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been four. This counter covers active sets which are related to RT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: five_cells_in_act_set_for_rt (M1007C4)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been five. This counter covers active sets which are related to RT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: six_cells_in_act_set_for_rt (M1007C5)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been six. This counter covers active sets which are related to RT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: softer_ho_dur_on_srnc_for_rt (M1007C6)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which the cell participates in softer handover on SRNC side for RT traffic. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: softer_ho_dur_on_drnc_for_rt (M1007C7)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which the cell participates in softer handover on DRNC side for RT/NRT traffic. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: soft_ho_dur_on_srnc_for_rt (M1007C8)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which the cell participates in inter-RNC soft handover on SRNC side for RT traffic. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: soft_ho_dur_on_drnc_for_rt (M1007C9)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which the cell participates in inter-RNC soft handover on DRNC side for RT/NRT traffic. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: cell_add_req_on_sho_for_rt (M1007C10)
kpi_info.use: The number of cell addition requests (excluding UE repetitions). Note: the counter is not updated in the cell that is the object of the addition request (see the Updated field). Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: cell_del_req_on_sho_for_rt (M1007C11)
kpi_info.use: The number of cell deletion requests, excluding rx-tx time difference reasons. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: cell_repl_req_on_sho_for_rt (M1007C12)
kpi_info.use: The number of cell replacement requests (excluding UE repetitions). Note: this counter is not updated in the non-active cell that triggers the replacement request (see the Updated field). Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: cell_add_fail_on_sho_for_rt (M1007C13)
kpi_info.use: The number of repeated cell addition requests after failure. Note: the counter is not updated in the cell that is the object of the addition request (see Updated field). Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: cell_repl_fail_on_sho_for_rt (M1007C14)
kpi_info.use: The number of repeated cell replacement requests after failure. Note: the counter is not updated in the cell that is the object of the replacement request (see the Updated field). Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: succ_updates_on_sho_for_rt (M1007C15)
kpi_info.use: The number of successful active set updates for RT traffic. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: unsucc_updates_on_sho_for_rt (M1007C16)
kpi_info.use: The number of unsuccessful active set updates for RT traffic. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: high_ue_rx_tx_time_dif_rt (M1007C17)
kpi_info.use: The number of times when the Rx-Tx time difference for a radio link has exceeded the threshold during soft handover. This event starts the cell deletion procedure. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: low_ue_rx_tx_time_dif_for_rt (M1007C18)
kpi_info.use: The number of times when the Rx-Tx time difference for a radio link has gone under the threshold during soft handover. This event starts the cell deletion procedure. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: one_cell_in_act_set_for_nrt (M1007C19)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been one. This counter covers active sets which are related to NRT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: two_cells_in_act_set_for_nrt (M1007C20)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been two. This counter covers active sets which are related to NRT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: three_cells_in_act_set_nrt (M1007C21)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been three. This counter covers active sets which are related to NRT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: four_cells_in_act_set_nrt (M1007C22)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been four. This counter covers active sets which are related to NRT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: five_cells_in_act_set_nrt (M1007C23)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been five. This counter covers active sets which are related to NRT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: six_cells_in_act_set_for_nrt (M1007C24)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which this cell has belonged to the active set the size of which has been six. This counter covers active sets which are related to NRT connections. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: softer_ho_dur_on_srnc_nrt (M1007C25)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which the cell participates in softer handover on SRNC side for NRT traffic. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: soft_ho_dur_on_srnc_for_nrt (M1007C26)
kpi_info.use: Sum of time periods during which the cell participates in inter-RNC soft handover on SRNC side for NRT traffic. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: cell_add_req_on_sho_for_nrt (M1007C27)
kpi_info.use: The number of cell addition requests (excluding UE repetitions). Note: the counter is not updated in the cell that is the object of the addition request (see the Updated field). Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: cell_del_req_on_sho_for_nrt (M1007C28)
kpi_info.use: The number of cell deletion requests, excluding Rx-Tx time difference reasons. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: cell_repl_req_on_sho_for_nrt (M1007C29)
kpi_info.use: The number of cell replacement requests (excluding UE repetitions). Note: this counter is not updated in the non-active cell that triggers the replacement request (see the Updated field). Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: cell_add_fail_on_sho_for_nrt (M1007C30)
kpi_info.use: The number of repeated cell addition requests after failure. Note: the counter is not updated in the cell that is the object of the addition request (see the Updated field). Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: cell_repl_fail_on_sho_nrt (M1007C31)
kpi_info.use: The number of repeated cell replacement requests after failure. Note: the counter is not updated in the cell that is the object of the replacement request (see the Updated field). Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: succ_updates_on_sho_for_nrt (M1007C32)
kpi_info.use: The number of successful active set updates for NRT traffic. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: unsucc_updates_on_sho_nrt (M1007C33)
kpi_info.use: The number of unsuccessful active set updates for NRT traffic. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: high_ue_rx_tx_time_dif_nrt (M1007C34)
kpi_info.use: The number of times when the Rx-Tx time difference for a radio link has exceeded the threshold during soft handover. This event starts cell deletion procedure. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: low_ue_rx_tx_time_dif_nrt (M1007C35)
kpi_info.use: The number of times when the Rx-Tx time difference for a radio link has gone under the threshold during soft handover. This event starts the cell deletion procedure. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: CELL_DEL_FAIL_ON_SHO_FOR_RT (M1007C36)
kpi_info.use: This counter is updated, when UE sends a periodic measurement report triggered by event 1B to the RNC in order to remove a cell from the active set. That situation can appear for example when the RNC is prevented to delete the old branch to the active set before the new branch is synchronized. Event 1B triggered periodic reporting is controlled with the Drop Window and Drop Reporting Interval parameters. Only the serving RNC (SRNC) can update the counter. The counter is updated in every cell that is in the active set on the SRNC side when the RNC receives the measurement report. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: CELL_DEL_FAIL_ON_SHO_FOR_NRT (M1007C37)
kpi_info.use: This counter is updated, when UE sends a periodic measurement report triggered by event 1B to the RNC in order to remove a cell from the active set. That situation can appear, for example, when the RNC is prevented from deleting the old branch to the active set before the new branch is synchronised. Event 1B triggered periodic reporting is controlled with the Drop Window and Drop Reporting Interval parameters. Only the serving RNC (SRNC) can update the counter. The counter is updated in every cell that is in the active set on the SRNC side when the RNC receives the measurement report. UPDATED:When the SRNC receives the event-triggered (event 1B) periodic measurement report. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: CPICH_ECNO_CLASS_0 (M1007C38)
kpi_info.use: Number of received 1A intra-frequency measurement reports in which the CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 0 range. The CPICH Ec/No measuring is done only for the best cell in the active set, i.e. the cell in the AS with the highest Ec/No value. UPDATED:When the UE sends the 1A event triggered intra-frequency measurement report to the RNC in the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message and the reported CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 0 range (39<=EcNo<=49), corresponding to (-5dB<=EcIo) in power values.

kpi_info.title: CPICH_ECNO_CLASS_1 (M1007C39)
kpi_info.use: Number of received 1A intra-frequency measurement reports in which the CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 1 range. The CPICH Ec/No measuring is done only for the best cell in the active set, i.e. the cell in the AS with the highest Ec/No value. UPDATED:When the UE sends the 1A event triggered intra-frequency measurement report to the RNC in the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message and the reported CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 1 range (29<=EcNo<39), corresponding to (-10dB<=EcIo<-5dB) in power values.

kpi_info.title: CPICH_ECNO_CLASS_2 (M1007C40)
kpi_info.use: Number of received 1A intra-frequency measurement reports in which the CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 2 range. The CPICH Ec/No measuring is done only for the best cell in the active set, i.e. the cell in the AS with the highest Ec/No value. UPDATED:When the UE sends the 1A event triggered intra-frequency measurement report to the RNC in the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message and the reported CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 2 range (25<=EcNo<29), corresponding to (-12dB<=EcIo<-10dB) in power values.

kpi_info.title: CPICH_ECNO_CLASS_3 (M1007C41)
kpi_info.use: Number of received 1A intra-frequency measurement reports in which the CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 3 range. The CPICH Ec/No measuring is done only for the best cell in the active set, i.e. the cell in the AS with the highest Ec/No value. UPDATED:When the UE sends the 1A event triggered intra-frequency measurement report to the RNC in the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message and the reported CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 3 range (21<=EcNo<25), corresponding to (-14dB<=EcIo<-12dB) in power values.

kpi_info.title: CPICH_ECNO_CLASS_4 (M1007C42)
kpi_info.use: Number of received 1A intra-frequency measurement reports in which the CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 4 range. The CPICH Ec/No measuring is done only for the best cell in the active set, i.e. the cell in the AS with the highest Ec/No value. UPDATED:When the UE sends the 1A event triggered intra-frequency measurement report to the RNC in the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message and the reported CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 4 range (17<=EcNo<21), corresponding to (-16dB<=EcIo<-14dB) in power values.

kpi_info.title: CPICH_ECNO_CLASS_5 (M1007C43)
kpi_info.use: Number of received 1A intra-frequency measurement reports in which the CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 5 range. The CPICH Ec/No measuring is done only for the best cell in the active set, i.e. the cell in the AS with the highest Ec/No value. UPDATED:When the UE sends the 1A event triggered intra-frequency measurement report to the RNC in the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message and the reported CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 5 range (13<=EcNo<17), corresponding to (-18dB<=EcIo<-16dB) in power values.

kpi_info.title: CPICH_ECNO_CLASS_6 (M1007C44)
kpi_info.use: Number of received 1A intra-frequency measurement reports in which the CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 6 range. The CPICH Ec/No measuring is done only for the best cell in the active set, i.e. the cell in the AS with the highest Ec/No value. UPDATED:When the UE sends the 1A event triggered intra-frequency measurement report to the RNC in the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message and the reported CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 6 range (9<=EcNo<13), corresponding to (-20dB<=EcIo<-18dB) in power values.

kpi_info.title: CPICH_ECNO_CLASS_7 (M1007C45)
kpi_info.use: Number of received 1A intra-frequency measurement reports in which the CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 7 range. The CPICH Ec/No measuring is done only for the best cell in the active set, i.e. the cell in the AS with the highest Ec/No value. UPDATED:When the UE sends the 1A event triggered intra-frequency measurement report to the RNC in the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message and the reported CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 7 range (5<=EcNo<9), corresponding to (-22dB<=EcIo<-20dB) in power values.

kpi_info.title: CPICH_ECNO_CLASS_8 (M1007C46)
kpi_info.use: Number of received 1A intra-frequency measurement reports in which the CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 8 range. The CPICH Ec/No measuring is done only for the best cell in the active set, i.e. the cell in the AS with the highest Ec/No value. UPDATED:When the UE sends the 1A event triggered intra-frequency measurement report to the RNC in the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message and the reported CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 8 range (1<=EcNo<5), corresponding to (-24dB<=EcIo<-22dB) in power values.

kpi_info.title: CPICH_ECNO_CLASS_9 (M1007C47)
kpi_info.use: Number of received 1A intra-frequency measurement reports in which the CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 9 range. The CPICH Ec/No measuring is done only for the best cell in the active set, i.e. the cell in the AS with the highest Ec/No value. UPDATED:When the UE sends the 1A event triggered intra-frequency measurement report to the RNC in the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message and the reported CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 9 range (EcNo=0), corresponding to (EcIo<-24dB) in power values.

kpi_info.title: ONE_CELL_IN_ACT_SET_HSDPA (M1007C48)
kpi_info.use: The sum of time periods the one cell in Active Set during the HSDPA SHO. UPDATED:The serving RNC updates this counter when the active set size is changed, and the active set size has been one before the change, and the UE has got HS-DSCH connection. The counter is updated also when the user's HS-DSCH allocation is released even if active set is not changed. This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the active set before the change of the active set.

kpi_info.title: TWO_CELLS_IN_ACT_SET_HSDPA (M1007C49)
kpi_info.use: The sum of time periods two cells in Active Set during the HSDPA SHO. UPDATED:The serving RNC updates this counter when the active set size is changed, and the active set size has been two before the change, and the UE has got HS-DSCH connection. The counter is updated also when the user's HS-DSCH allocation is released even if active set is not changed. This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the active set before the change of the active set.

kpi_info.title: THREE_CELLS_IN_ACT_SET_HSDPA (M1007C50)
kpi_info.use: The sum of time periods three cells in Active Set during the HSDPA SHO. UPDATED:The serving RNC updates this counter when the active set size is changed, and the active set size has been three before the change, and the UE has got HS-DSCH connection. The counter is updated also when the user's HS-DSCH allocation is released even if active set is not changed. This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the active set before the change of the active set.

kpi_info.title: SOFTER_HO_DUR_HSDPA (M1007C51)
kpi_info.use: Softer HO duration on the SRNC side for HSDPA. UPDATED:SRNC updates this counter when the active set size is changed, and the UE has been in softer handover before the change and the UE has got HS-DSCH connection. The counter is updated also when the user's HS-DSCH allocation is released even if active set is not changed. This counter is updated in every cell participating in the softer handover before the change of the active set.

kpi_info.title: INTER_RNC_SOFT_HO_DUR_HSDPA (M1007C52)
kpi_info.use: Inter-RNC soft HO duration on the SRNC side for HSDPA. UPDATED:SRNC updates this counter when the active set size is changed, and the UE has been in Inter-RNC soft handover before the change and the UE has got HS-DSCH connection. The counter is updated also when the user's HS-DSCH allocation is released even if active set is not changed. This counter is updated in every cell participating in the softer handover before the change of the active set.

kpi_info.title: CELL_ADD_REQ_ON_SHO_HSDPA (M1007C53)
kpi_info.use: Cell Addition Requests on SHO for HSDPA. UPDATED:When the SRNC receives an RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message from the UE, and the message is triggered due to event 1A. If RNW-parameter HSDPAMobility is set to value "Enabled", this results in soft handover branch addition. If HSDPAMobility is set to value "Disabled", the UE will be transferred to Cell-FACH state. If the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message includes requests to add two cells to the active set and HSDPAMobility="Enabled", this counter is incremented by two. This counter is not updated if there exist ongoing SHO procedures for this UE. This counter is not updated if the previous cell addition request for the UE has failed and this request is made for the same cell (see M1007C13). This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the active set when the message is received (before possible active set changes).

kpi_info.title: CELL_DEL_REQ_ON_SHO_HSDPA (M1007C54)
kpi_info.use: Cell Deletion Requests on SHO for HSDPA. UPDATED:When the SRNC receives an RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message from the UE, and the message is triggered due to event 1B. If the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message includes requests to delete two cells from the active set, this counter is incremented by two. This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the active set when the message is received (before possible active set changes).

kpi_info.title: CELL_REPL_REQ_ON_SHO_HSDPA (M1007C55)
kpi_info.use: Cell Replacement Requests on SHO for HSDPA. UPDATED:When the SRNC receives an RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message from the UE, and the message is triggered due to event 1C. This counter is not updated if there exist ongoing SHO procedures for this UE. This counter is not updated if the previous cell replacement request for the UE has failed and this request is made for the same cell (see M1007C14). This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the active set when the message is received (before possible active set changes).

kpi_info.title: CELL_ADD_FAIL_ON_SHO_HSDPA (M1007C56)
kpi_info.use: Cell Addition Requests failed on SHO for HSDPA. UPDATED:When the SRNC receives an RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message from the UE, and the message is triggered due to event 1A, and the previous cell addition request for the UE has failed and this request is made for the same cell. This counter is not updated if there exist ongoing SHO procedures for this UE. This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the active set when the message is received (before possible active set changes).

kpi_info.title: CELL_DEL_FAIL_ON_SHO_HSDPA (M1007C57)
kpi_info.use: Cell Deletion Requests failed on SHO for HSDPA. UPDATED:When the SRNC receives the event-triggered (event 1B) periodic measurement report.

kpi_info.title: CELL_REPL_FAIL_ON_SHO_HSDPA (M1007C58)
kpi_info.use: Cell Replacement Requests failed on SHO for HSDPA. UPDATED:When the SRNC receives an RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message from the UE, and the message is triggered due to event 1C, and the previous cell replacement request for the UE has failed and this request is made for the same cell. This counter is not updated if there exist ongoing SHO procedures for this UE. This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the active set when the message is received (before possible active set changes).

kpi_info.title: SUCC_UPDATES_ON_SHO_HSDPA (M1007C59)
kpi_info.use: Number of successful Active Set Updates on SHO for HSDPA. UPDATED:When the RNC receives an RRC: ACTIVE SET UPDATE COMPLETE message within a certain time period. This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the active set before changes.

kpi_info.title: UNSUCC_UPDATES_ON_SHO_HSDPA (M1007C60)
kpi_info.use: Number of unsuccessful Active Set Updates on SHO for HSDPA. UPDATED:When the RNC receives an RRC: ACTIVE SET UPDATE FAILURE message from the UE or the RNC does not receive an RRC: ACTIVE SET UPDATE COMPLETE message from the UE within a certain time period. This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the active set before changes.

kpi_info.title: HIGH_UE_RX_TX_TIME_DIF_HSDPA (M1007C61)
kpi_info.use: The number of high UE Rx-Tx time difference for HSDPA mobility. UPDATED:When the SRNC receives an RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message from the UE, and the message is triggered due to event 6F. This counter is updated in the active set cell that triggered the event 6F.

kpi_info.title: LOW_UE_RX_TX_TIME_DIF_HSDPA (M1007C62)
kpi_info.use: The number of low UE Rx-Tx time difference for HSDPA mobility. UPDATED:When the SRNC receives an RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message from the UE, and the message is triggered due to event 6G. This counter is updated in the active set cell that triggered the event 6G.

kpi_info.title: ONE_CELL_IN_EDCH_AS_DURA (M1007C63)
kpi_info.use: The sum of the time periods during which this cell has belonged to the E-DCH active set, whose size has been one. UPDATED:The serving RNC updates this counter when the active set size is changed, and the active set size has been one before the change, and the UE has got an E-DCH connection. The counter is updated also when the user's E-DCH allocation is released even if the active set is not changed. This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the Serving E-DCH active set before the change of the active set.

kpi_info.title: TWO_CELLS_IN_EDCH_AS_DURA (M1007C64)
kpi_info.use: The sum of the time periods during which this cell has belonged to the E-DCH active set, whose size has been two. UPDATED:The serving RNC updates this counter when the active set size is changed, and the active set size has been two before the change, and the UE has got an E-DCH connection. The counter is updated also when the user's E-DCH allocation is released even if the active set is not changed. This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the Serving E-DCH active set before the change of the active set.

kpi_info.title: THREE_CELLS_IN_EDCH_AS_DURA (M1007C65)
kpi_info.use: The sum of the time periods during which this cell has belonged to the E-DCH active set, whose size has been three. UPDATED:The serving RNC updates this counter when the active set size is changed, and the active set size has been three before the change, and the UE has got an E-DCH connection. The counter is updated also when the user's E-DCH allocation is released even if the active set is not changed. This counter is updated in every cell belonging to the Serving E-DCH active set before the change of the active set.

kpi_info.title: EDCH_SOFTER_HO_DURA (M1007C66)
kpi_info.use: E-DCH softer handover duration. UPDATED:SRNC updates this counter when the active set size is changed, and two or three of the UE's E-DCH radio links have been in a softer handover with each other before the change. The counter is updated also when the user's E-DCH allocation is released even if the active set is not changed. This counter is updated in every Serving E-DCH active set cell participating in the E-DCH softer handover before the change of the active set.

kpi_info.title: CELL_ADD_ATT_UE_REQ_EDCH_AS (M1007C67)
kpi_info.use: The number of cell addition attempts to E-DCH active set due to UE reporting event 1A or 1C. UPDATED:When a cell is attempted to be added into E-DCH active set due to UE reporting 1A or 1C event. The counter is updated for the cells that are attempted to be added into E-DCH active set. If the event includes two cells and both of them qualify as candidates for E-DCH active set, the counter is updated for both cells. If the soft handover procedure is prevented by "ongoing parallel procedures", neither this attempt counter nor any failure counter is updated.

kpi_info.title: CELL_ADD_SUCC_EDCH_AS (M1007C68)
kpi_info.use: The number of cells successfully added to E-DCH active set. UPDATED:The number of times when a cell was successfully added to E-DCH active set either as a result of UE reported 1A/1C event or RNC internal retry timer.

kpi_info.title: CELL_ADDED_ONLY_TO_DCH_AS (M1007C69)
kpi_info.use: The number of times when the cell could not be added to E-DCH active set but addition to DCH active set was successful. UPDATED:When a cell could not be added into E-DCH active set due to HSUPA resource shortage (e.g. maximum number of HSUPA users in cell), but the cell was still added into DCH active set.

kpi_info.title: CELL_ADD_ATT_RETRY_EDCH_AS (M1007C70)
kpi_info.use: The number of cell addition attempts to E-DCH active set due to retry timer. UPDATED:When a cell is attempted to be added into E-DCH active set due to retry timer started due to an earlier failure in an attempt to add an E-DCH capable cell into E-DCH active set.

kpi_info.title: SETUP_FAIL_SHO_BRANCH_BTS (M1007C71)
kpi_info.use: The number of soft handover branch setup failures due to BTS. This counter is updated for the cell(s) where the failure occurred. UPDATED:When the SHO branch setup fails due to BTS resources. The BTS resources here mean either NBAP: RADIO LINK SETUP FAILURE, NBAP: RADIO LINK ADDITION FAILURE or that RNC does not receive any answer from the BTS. The counter is updated for the cell, where the failure occured. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: SETUP_FAIL_SHO_BRANCH_IUB (M1007C72)
kpi_info.use: The number of soft handover branch setup failures due to Iub transmission. This counter is updated for the cell(s) where the failure occurred. UPDATED: When the SHO branch setup fails due to Iub transport. The transport failures include both CAC (Connection Admission Control) negative acknowledgements and signalling failures. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.
